command.text: SELECT schvchdlydetailreg.Trs_No, schvchdlydetailreg.schvchdlyhdregid, schvchdlyhdreg.ReferanceNo AS schvchdlyhdregReferanceNo, schvchdlyhdregsgm.sgm_Nm AS schvchdlyhdregsgmsgm_Nm, schvchdlyhdregsgmOpco.OpcoName AS schvchdlyhdregsgmOpcoOpcoName, schvchdlyhdregIDregorg.NAME_1 AS schvchdlyhdregIDregorgNAME_1, schvchdlyhdregbranch.Desc1 AS schvchdlyhdregbranchDesc1, schvchdlyhdregbranchsgm.sgm_Nm AS schvchdlyhdregbranchsgmsgm_Nm, schvchdlyhdregbranchGender.Gender AS schvchdlyhdregbranchGenderGender, schvchdlyhdregbranchstage.ShortDesc1 AS schvchdlyhdregbranchstageShortDesc1, schvchdlyhdregbranchschtyp.schtypDesc AS schvchdlyhdregbranchschtypschtypDesc, schvchdlydetailreg.branch, Thebranch.Desc1 AS ThebranchDesc1, Thebranchsgm.sgm_Nm AS Thebranchsgmsgm_Nm, ThebranchsgmOpco.OpcoName AS ThebranchsgmOpcoOpcoName, ThebranchGender.Gender AS ThebranchGenderGender, Thebranchstage.ShortDesc1 AS ThebranchstageShortDesc1, Thebranchschtyp.schtypDesc AS ThebranchschtypschtypDesc, schvchdlydetailreg.acdcode, acd.AcademicYear AS acdAcademicYear, acdGlFinperiod.Fin_period_info AS acdGlFinperiodFin_period_info, acdGlFinperiodaccountnumber.Acc_Nm AS acdGlFinperiodaccountnumberAcc_Nm, schvchdlydetailreg.StudentCode, Student.SchstCivilidnumber AS StudentSchstCivilidnumber, Studentarea.Desc1 AS StudentareaDesc1, Studentbranch.Desc1 AS StudentbranchDesc1, Studentbranchsgm.sgm_Nm AS Studentbranchsgmsgm_Nm, StudentbranchGender.Gender AS StudentbranchGenderGender, Studentbranchstage.ShortDesc1 AS StudentbranchstageShortDesc1, Studentbranchschtyp.schtypDesc AS StudentbranchschtypschtypDesc, StudentCntry_.Cntry_Nm AS StudentCntry_Cntry_Nm, StudentGender.Gender AS StudentGenderGender, StudentReligion.Reljan_nm AS StudentReligionReljan_nm, Studentstate.State_Nm AS StudentstateState_Nm, Studentid.name_1 AS Studentidname_1, Studentacd.AcademicYear AS StudentacdAcademicYear, StudentacdGlFinperiod.Fin_period_info AS StudentacdGlFinperiodFin_period_info, StudentClass.ClassDesc1 AS StudentClassClassDesc1, StudentSchclasskind.Schclasskinddesc AS StudentSchclasskindSchclasskinddesc, StudentFather.fathfirstname1 AS StudentFatherfathfirstname1, StudentFatherMaritalStatus.Status_Nm AS StudentFatherMaritalStatusStatus_Nm, StudentFatherarea.Desc1 AS StudentFatherareaDesc1, StudentFatherCntry_.Cntry_Nm AS StudentFatherCntry_Cntry_Nm, StudentFatherreligion.Reljan_nm AS StudentFatherreligionReljan_nm, StudentFatherState.State_Nm AS StudentFatherStateState_Nm, StudentFatherjob_.job_desc AS StudentFatherjob_job_desc, StudentGrade.ShortDesc1 AS StudentGradeShortDesc1, StudentGradeacd.AcademicYear AS StudentGradeacdAcademicYear, StudentGradeStage.ShortDesc1 AS StudentGradeStageShortDesc1, StudentMother.firstname1 AS StudentMotherfirstname1, StudentMotherarea.Desc1 AS StudentMotherareaDesc1, StudentMotherCntry_.Cntry_Nm AS StudentMotherCntry_Cntry_Nm, StudentMotherreligion.Reljan_nm AS StudentMotherreligionReljan_nm, StudentMotherState.State_Nm AS StudentMotherStateState_Nm, StudentMotherjob_.job_desc AS StudentMotherjob_job_desc, StudentStage.ShortDesc1 AS StudentStageShortDesc1, Studentschstatus_.schstatus_name AS Studentschstatus_schstatus_name, Studentschstclasskinddmg.schstclasskinddmgDesc AS StudentschstclasskinddmgschstclasskinddmgDesc, Studentschstspl.schstsplDsc AS StudentschstsplschstsplDsc, Studentschsthlthcase.schsthlthcaseDesc AS StudentschsthlthcaseschsthlthcaseDesc, Studentstudentsefa.studentsefaar AS Studentstudentsefastudentsefaar, Studentstudentsefadebitaccount.Acc_Nm AS StudentstudentsefadebitaccountAcc_Nm, Studentschstudenttyp.schstudenttyp AS Studentschstudenttypschstudenttyp, StudentSchtransfer.SchtransferDesc AS StudentSchtransferSchtransferDesc, schvchdlydetailreg.FatherCode, Father.fathfirstname1 AS Fatherfathfirstname1, FatherMaritalStatus.Status_Nm AS FatherMaritalStatusStatus_Nm, Fatherarea.Desc1 AS FatherareaDesc1, FatherCntry_.Cntry_Nm AS FatherCntry_Cntry_Nm, Fatherreligion.Reljan_nm AS FatherreligionReljan_nm, FatherState.State_Nm AS FatherStateState_Nm, Fatherjob_.job_desc AS Fatherjob_job_desc, schvchdlydetailreg.Trsd_Dt, schvchdlydetailreg.schpaymenttypeid, schpaymenttype.schpaymenttypenm AS schpaymenttypeschpaymenttypenm, schpaymenttypedebitaccount.Acc_Nm AS schpaymenttypedebitaccountAcc_Nm, schpaymenttypedebitaccountClsacc_.Acc_Nm AS schpaymenttypedebitaccountClsacc_Acc_Nm, schpaymenttypedebitaccountAcc_Bnd.Acc_Nm AS schpaymenttypedebitaccountAcc_BndAcc_Nm, schpaymenttypecreditaccount.Acc_Nm AS schpaymenttypecreditaccountAcc_Nm, schpaymenttypecreditaccountClsacc_.Acc_Nm AS schpaymenttypecreditaccountClsacc_Acc_Nm, schpaymenttypecreditaccountAcc_Bnd.Acc_Nm AS schpaymenttypecreditaccountAcc_BndAcc_Nm, schvchdlydetailreg.Mony_Paid, schvchdlydetailreg.Notes, schvchdlydetailreg.totalbalance, schvchdlydetailreg.Sumofdebitcal, schvchdlydetailreg.Sumofdebitcal1, schvchdlydetailreg.Sumofcerditcal, schvchdlydetailreg.totalbalance1, schvchdlyhdreg.Trs_Dt, Student.FirstName1, schvchdlyhdreg.acdcode AS schvchdlyhdregacdcode, schvchdlyhdreg.branch AS schvchdlyhdregbranch FROM dbo.schvchdlydetailreg AS schvchdlydetailreg LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schvchdlyhdreg AS schvchdlyhdreg ON schvchdlydetailreg.schvchdlyhdregid = schvchdlyhdreg.schvchdlyhdregid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.glmulcmp AS schvchdlyhdregsgm ON schvchdlyhdreg.sgm = schvchdlyhdregsgm.sgmid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.OpCo AS schvchdlyhdregsgmOpco ON schvchdlyhdregsgm.OpcoID = schvchdlyhdregsgmOpco.OpcoIDidentity LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.REG_ORGANIZATIONS AS schvchdlyhdregIDregorg ON schvchdlyhdreg.IDregorg = schvchdlyhdregIDregorg.IDIDregorg LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schBranch AS schvchdlyhdregbranch ON schvchdlyhdreg.branch = schvchdlyhdregbranch.branch LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.glmulcmp AS schvchdlyhdregbranchsgm ON schvchdlyhdregbranch.sgm = schvchdlyhdregbranchsgm.sgmid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyGender AS schvchdlyhdregbranchGender ON schvchdlyhdregbranch.Genderid = schvchdlyhdregbranchGender.Genderid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS schvchdlyhdregbranchstage ON schvchdlyhdregbranch.stagecode = schvchdlyhdregbranchstage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schtyp AS schvchdlyhdregbranchschtyp ON schvchdlyhdregbranch.schtypid = schvchdlyhdregbranchschtyp.schtypid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schBranch AS Thebranch ON schvchdlydetailreg.branch = Thebranch.branch LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.glmulcmp AS Thebranchsgm ON Thebranch.sgm = Thebranchsgm.sgmid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.OpCo AS ThebranchsgmOpco ON Thebranchsgm.OpcoID = ThebranchsgmOpco.OpcoIDidentity LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyGender AS ThebranchGender ON Thebranch.Genderid = ThebranchGender.Genderid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS Thebranchstage ON Thebranch.stagecode = Thebranchstage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schtyp AS Thebranchschtyp ON Thebranch.schtypid = Thebranchschtyp.schtypid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schAcademicyear AS acd ON schvchdlydetailreg.acdcode = acd.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GlFinanceperiod AS acdGlFinperiod ON acd.GlFinperiodID = acdGlFinperiod.GlFinperiodID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmstrfl AS acdGlFinperiodaccountnumber ON acdGlFinperiod.accountnumber = acdGlFinperiodaccountnumber.Acc_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SchStudent AS Student ON schvchdlydetailreg.StudentCode = Student.StudentCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schArea AS Studentarea ON Student.area = Studentarea.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schBranch AS Studentbranch ON Student.branch = Studentbranch.branch LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.glmulcmp AS Studentbranchsgm ON Studentbranch.sgm = Studentbranchsgm.sgmid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyGender AS StudentbranchGender ON Studentbranch.Genderid = StudentbranchGender.Genderid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS Studentbranchstage ON Studentbranch.stagecode = Studentbranchstage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schtyp AS Studentbranchschtyp ON Studentbranch.schtypid = Studentbranchschtyp.schtypid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS StudentCntry_ ON Student.Cntry_No = StudentCntry_.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyGender AS StudentGender ON Student.Genderid = StudentGender.Genderid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyReljan AS StudentReligion ON Student.Religion = StudentReligion.reljan LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyState AS Studentstate ON Student.state = Studentstate.State LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.reg_other_schools AS Studentid ON Student.id = Studentid.id LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schAcademicyear AS Studentacd ON Student.acdcode = Studentacd.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GlFinanceperiod AS StudentacdGlFinperiod ON Studentacd.GlFinperiodID = StudentacdGlFinperiod.GlFinperiodID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schClassConfig AS StudentClass ON Student.Class = StudentClass.classcode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Schclasskindlist AS StudentSchclasskind ON Student.Schclasskindid = StudentSchclasskind.Schclasskindid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schFather AS StudentFather ON Student.FatherCode = StudentFather.FatherCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyStatus AS StudentFatherMaritalStatus ON StudentFather.MaritalStatus = StudentFatherMaritalStatus.Status_Type LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schArea AS StudentFatherarea ON StudentFather.area = StudentFatherarea.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS StudentFatherCntry_ ON StudentFather.Cntry_No = StudentFatherCntry_.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyReljan AS StudentFatherreligion ON StudentFather.religion = StudentFatherreligion.reljan LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyState AS StudentFatherState ON StudentFather.State = StudentFatherState.State LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SchFatherjob AS StudentFatherjob_ ON StudentFather.job_no = StudentFatherjob_.job_no LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schGrade AS StudentGrade ON Student.GradeCode = StudentGrade.GradeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schAcademicyear AS StudentGradeacd ON StudentGrade.acdcode = StudentGradeacd.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS StudentGradeStage ON StudentGrade.StageCode = StudentGradeStage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schMother AS StudentMother ON Student.MotherCode = StudentMother.MotherCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schArea AS StudentMotherarea ON StudentMother.area = StudentMotherarea.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS StudentMotherCntry_ ON StudentMother.Cntry_No = StudentMotherCntry_.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyReljan AS StudentMotherreligion ON StudentMother.religion = StudentMotherreligion.reljan LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyState AS StudentMotherState ON StudentMother.State = StudentMotherState.State LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SchMotherjob AS StudentMotherjob_ ON StudentMother.job_no = StudentMotherjob_.job_no LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS StudentStage ON Student.Stage = StudentStage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstatus AS Studentschstatus_ ON Student.schstatus_code = Studentschstatus_.schstatus_code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstclasskinddmg AS Studentschstclasskinddmg ON Student.schstclasskinddmgid = Studentschstclasskinddmg.schstclasskinddmgid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstespetialest AS Studentschstspl ON Student.schstsplid = Studentschstspl.schstsplid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schsthealthcase AS Studentschsthlthcase ON Student.schsthlthcaseid = Studentschsthlthcase.schsthlthcaseid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Schstudentsefa AS Studentstudentsefa ON Student.studentsefa = Studentstudentsefa.studentsefaid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmstrfl AS Studentstudentsefadebitaccount ON Studentstudentsefa.debitaccount = Studentstudentsefadebitaccount.Acc_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstudenttyp AS Studentschstudenttyp ON Student.schstudenttypid = Studentschstudenttyp.schstudenttypid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Schtransferlist AS StudentSchtransfer ON Student.Schtransferid = StudentSchtransfer.Schtransferid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schFather AS Father ON schvchdlydetailreg.FatherCode = Father.FatherCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyStatus AS FatherMaritalStatus ON Father.MaritalStatus = FatherMaritalStatus.Status_Type LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schArea AS Fatherarea ON Father.area = Fatherarea.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS FatherCntry_ ON Father.Cntry_No = FatherCntry_.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyReljan AS Fatherreligion ON Father.religion = Fatherreligion.reljan LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyState AS FatherState ON Father.State = FatherState.State LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SchFatherjob AS Fatherjob_ ON Father.job_no = Fatherjob_.job_no LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schpaymenttype AS schpaymenttype ON schvchdlydetailreg.schpaymenttypeid = schpaymenttype.schpaymenttypeid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmstrfl AS schpaymenttypedebitaccount ON schpaymenttype.debitaccount = schpaymenttypedebitaccount.Acc_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmfbab AS schpaymenttypedebitaccountClsacc_ ON schpaymenttypedebitaccount.Clsacc_No = schpaymenttypedebitaccountClsacc_.Acc_Bab LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmfband AS schpaymenttypedebitaccountAcc_Bnd ON schpaymenttypedebitaccount.Acc_Bnd = schpaymenttypedebitaccountAcc_Bnd.Acc_Bnd LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmstrfl AS schpaymenttypecreditaccount ON schpaymenttype.creditaccount = schpaymenttypecreditaccount.Acc_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmfbab AS schpaymenttypecreditaccountClsacc_ ON schpaymenttypecreditaccount.Clsacc_No = schpaymenttypecreditaccountClsacc_.Acc_Bab LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmfband AS schpaymenttypecreditaccountAcc_Bnd ON schpaymenttypecreditaccount.Acc_Bnd = schpaymenttypecreditaccountAcc_Bnd.Acc_Bnd

field.name: schvchdlyhdregacdGlFinperiodFin_period_info
field.label: schvchdlyhdregacd Gl Finperiod Fin period info

field.name: acdGlFinperiodFin_period_info
field.label: acd Gl Finperiod Fin period info
